text: Umbergaon assembly constituency is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Valsad district. It is a part of the Valsad (ST) parliamentary/Lok Sabha constituency. This seat is reserved for a member of the Scheduled tribes. As of 2017, there are a total of 243,340 voters in the constituency, of which 130,017 are male, 113,323 female and 0 others. The constituency recorded a voter turnout of 64.41% in the 2017 Gujarat Assembly Elections and the polling for this seat was held on December 9, 2017 in Phase 1 of the elections. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments # Umargam Taluka # Pardi Taluka (Part).
